name: Community at Aquatic Park
description: Seqouia Living - Aquatic Park - San Francisco Senior Center has social activities, fitness classes, social worker services, and low cost lunches. Offers exercise/recreational classes, social services, low-cost lunches. Seniors 60+ are able to enjoy this service for a suggested donation of $2, though no one is turned away for lack of funds. ​ Aquatic Park Center currently offers lunch Monday through Friday at two seatings: 11am and 12pm. howToGetIt: Phone: (415) 775-1866, Please call (415) 603-0190 one day in advance to ensure your spot at lunch. https://centers.sequoialiving.org/downtown/
